A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is one of my least favorite movies from the Star Wars series; fighting with Ep. 2 for the bottom of the barrel. It’s half mediocre to boring\, a quarter awful and a quarter good. I generally like the big three good guys\, and the new addition to the band as well; unfortunately\, Disney continues it‘s streak of crapping on the original trilogy almost every time it touches it.
